scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Groups_GroupMembershipList_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#if ($core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('viewType', 'list') == 'options') $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('options.vm') #else #set($group = $core_v2_group.Current) #set($canModifyMembership = $core_v2_nodePermission.Get('groups',$group.Id,'Group_ModifyMembership').IsAllowed) #set($pageSize = $core_v2_widget.GetIntValue('pageSize', 10)) #if ($canModifyMembership)
  • #if ($core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('Show').ToLower() == 'pending') $core_v2_language.GetResource('approve_all') $core_v2_language.GetResource('deny_all') #else $core_v2_language.GetResource('remove_all') #end
#end $core_v2_ui.PagedContent('list.vm', "%{ QueryStringProperty = 'groupmembers' }") #registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.groupMembershipList') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Groups_GroupMembershipList_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" /> <property id="viewType" resourceName="view_type" dataType="string" defaultValue="list" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyVisibilityValueSelectionControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform"> <propertyValue value="list" resourceName="view_type_list" propertiesToShow="pageSize" propertiesToHide="" /> <propertyValue value="options" resourceName="view_type_options" propertiesToShow="" propertiesToHide="pageSize" /> </property> <property id="pageSize" resourceName="page_size" dataType="int" defaultValue="10"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" minValue="1" maxValue="1000" /> </property> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Displays a list of members in the community.
There are no pending membership requests.
There are no role members currently.
It may take up to 24 hours for large community permissions to be assigned.
Please enter username(s) or role(s) to add as members.
Please enter username(s) or email address(es) to invite.
An error occurred while communicating with the server. Please try again.
Number of members to show per page
Are you sure you want to remove all of the selected members?
The selected members were removed from this community.
Are you sure you want to approve all of the selected members?
The selected members were added to this community.
Are you sure you want to deny all of the selected members?
The selected members were denied membership to this community.
Are you sure you want to remove this member? (this action cannot be undone)
The member's status in this community has been updated.
Your invitations have been sent successfully
社区 - 成员资格列表
显示社区中的成员列表。
没有待定成员资格请求。
最多可能需要 24 小时来分配大社区权限。
用户名或电子邮件地址
请输入要添加为成员的用户名或角色。
请输入要邀请的用户名或电子邮件地址。
与服务器通信时出错。请重试。
是否确定要移除所有所选成员?
已从此社区中移除所选成员。
是否确定要批准所有所选成员?
已向此社区中添加所选成员。
是否确定要拒绝所有所选成员?
已拒绝所选成员加入此社区。
是否确定要移除此成员?(此操作无法撤消)
已更新成员在此社区中的状态。
社群 - 成員資格清單
顯示社群中成員的清單。
沒有任何待處理的成員資格要求。
目前沒有任何角色成員。
最多可能需要等到 24 小時之後，才會指派大型社群權限。
使用者名稱或電子郵件地址
請輸入要新增為成員的使用者名稱或角色。
請輸入要邀請的使用者名稱或電子郵件地址。
與伺服器進行通訊時發生錯誤。請再試一次。
每個頁面要顯示的成員數目
您確定要移除所有選取的成員嗎?
選取的成員已從此社群中移除。
您確定要核准所有選取的成員嗎?
選取的成員已加入此社群。
您確定要拒絕所有選取的成員嗎?
已拒絕選取的成員取得此社群的成員資格。
您確定要移除這個成員嗎?(此動作無法復原)
此社群中的成員狀態已更新。
